programme.title: Вечер
programme.desc: Самые интересные и важные события дня.

programme.title: Америка
programme.desc: Ежедневная информационная программа Голоса Америки из студии в Вашингтоне.

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Главные события стран центральной Азии.

programme.title: Репортер
programme.desc: Документальная программа, рассказывающая о мировых событиях и жизни людей как в Германии и Европе, так и по всему миру. Журналисты программы показывают, как мир вокруг меняется на наших глазах.

programme.title: Археология. Интервью
programme.desc: Режиссер Марк Айзекс рисует богатый портрет мультикультурной жизни в Великобритании, рассматривая жизнь иммигрантов, живущих вдоль А5, одной из самых длинных и старых британских дорог. Протянувшаяся от Лондона до побережья Уэльса, эта дорога всегда была важным спасательным кругом для новых эмигрантов. Сегодня она является микрокосмом большого мира, и в фильме встречаются люди, чья жизнь теперь вращается вокруг этой дороги.

programme.title: Дороги к свободе
programme.desc: Совместный проект Радио Свобода и украинской телекомпании "Эспрессо ТВ". В студии - Виталий Портников и его гости. Удастся ли Украине противостоять российской военной агрессии? Как будут развиваться отношения между народами Украины и России? Выстоит ли Украина?

programme.title: Время человека
programme.desc: Героиня этой программы может дать урок каждому, как остаться верным себе и быть непохожим на остальных. Анастасия Бухреева живет в небольшом городке Лахеднопохья в Карелии. Еще в детстве ей поставили диагноз - алопеция. Это паралогическое выпадение волос. В подростковом возрасте Насте за то, что она выглядит не так, как большинство, сильно доставалось от сверстников. Тогда и началось её увлечение лошадьми. Сейчас Насте 40, она не стесняется себя и своей внешности, работает и продолжает заниматься конюшней. Только уже своей собственной. Этот выпуск расскажем о том, тяжело ли сейчас быть не такой как все в маленьком провинциальном городке.

programme.title: Балтия
programme.desc: Еженедельная информационная программа "Балтия" - непредвзятый взгляд на происходящее в Эстонии, Латвии и Литве. События, явления и люди в репортажах корреспондентов Настоящего Времени, работающих в регионе. Точная и беспристрастная информация, все точки зрения о происходящем в каждой из трех стран, входящих в Евросоюз и военный блок НАТО.

programme.title: Признаки жизни
programme.desc: Для многих это возможность начать жизнь в большом городе: они приезжают из других городов, из провинции, чтобы попробовать себя и открыть новые перспективы. О муринской молодежи отзываются как о "продвинутой", "современной" и даже "чуть-чуть инакомыслящей". Среди них есть те, кто бывал на протестах в Петербурге, а кто-то недоволен новым "железным занавесом" между Россией и Западом.

programme.title: Игра с опасностью
programme.desc: Документальный сериал о самых опасных дорогах мира. Эти транспортные артерии - зачастую единственный способ перевозки грузов первой необходимости в отдаленные населенные пункты. Смотрите сериал, чтобы узнать истории водителей и пассажиров, готовых рисковать жизнью, отправляясь в путь.

programme.title: Археология. Интервью
programme.desc: Режиссер Марк Айзекс рисует богатый портрет мультикультурной жизни в Великобритании, рассматривая жизнь иммигрантов, живущих вдоль А5, одной из самых длинных и старых британских дорог. Протянувшаяся от Лондона до побережья Уэльса, эта дорога всегда была важным спасательным кругом для новых эмигрантов. Сегодня она является микрокосмом большого мира, и в фильме встречаются люди, чья жизнь теперь вращается вокруг этой дороги.

programme.title: Новости. Азия
programme.desc: Коротко о главных событиях в странах Центральной Азии

programme.title: Специальный репортаж Настоящего Времени
programme.desc: Специальные репортажи Настоящего Времени рассказывают о событиях со всего мира, позволяя вам ближе познакомиться с самыми важными историями. Мы сосредотачиваемся на предоставлении глубокого анализа и эксклюзивной информации, чтобы дать вам более полное понимание этих значимых моментов. С экспертными комментариями, эксклюзивными интервью и репортажами с места событий мы предлагаем всесторонний взгляд на каждое событие, освещая мнения, которые вы не найдете в других источниках. Будь то политические события, культурные достижения или социальные движения, наши репортажи предлагают ясный и увлекательный взгляд на события, формирующие наше время.

programme.title: Утро
programme.desc: Программа "Утро" каждый будний день открывает информационную линейку телеканала "Настоящее Время". "Утро" выходит в прямом эфире из киевской студии и рассказывает зрителям о том, что им надо знать в самом начале дня. Главные новости, основные события наступающего дня, самые важные темы для обсуждения - в утренних эфирах каждый день.

programme.title: Лицом к событию
programme.desc: Лидер в той или иной сфере общественной жизни - человек известный и информированный - под перекрестным огнем вопросов ведущих программы Михаила Соколова и Елены Рыковцевой.

programme.title: Время человека
programme.desc: Героиня этой программы может дать урок каждому, как остаться верным себе и быть непохожим на остальных. Анастасия Бухреева живет в небольшом городке Лахеднопохья в Карелии. Еще в детстве ей поставили диагноз - алопеция. Это паралогическое выпадение волос. В подростковом возрасте Насте за то, что она выглядит не так, как большинство, сильно доставалось от сверстников. Тогда и началось её увлечение лошадьми. Сейчас Насте 40, она не стесняется себя и своей внешности, работает и продолжает заниматься конюшней. Только уже своей собственной. Этот выпуск расскажем о том, тяжело ли сейчас быть не такой как все в маленьком провинциальном городке.

programme.title: Игра с опасностью
programme.desc: Документальный сериал о самых опасных дорогах мира. Эти транспортные артерии - зачастую единственный способ перевозки грузов первой необходимости в отдаленные населенные пункты. Смотрите сериал, чтобы узнать истории водителей и пассажиров, готовых рисковать жизнью, отправляясь в путь.

programme.title: Донбас. Реалії
programme.desc: Восток Украины – спец. репортажи из зоны конфликта.

programme.title: DW
programme.desc: Нико ЛАНГЕ - эксперт по безопасности, аналитик Мюнхенской конференции по безопасности

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Главные события стран центральной Азии.

programme.title: Главное
programme.desc: Ежедневная информационная программа.

programme.title: Археология. Интервью
programme.desc: Режиссер Марк Айзекс рисует богатый портрет мультикультурной жизни в Великобритании, рассматривая жизнь иммигрантов, живущих вдоль А5, одной из самых длинных и старых британских дорог. Протянувшаяся от Лондона до побережья Уэльса, эта дорога всегда была важным спасательным кругом для новых эмигрантов. Сегодня она является микрокосмом большого мира, и в фильме встречаются люди, чья жизнь теперь вращается вокруг этой дороги.

programme.title: Главное
programme.desc: Ежедневная информационная программа.

programme.title: Перекресток
programme.desc: На севере Сахалина проживает около 300 представителей народа уйльта и примерно 4000 нивхов. Сахалин для них - историческая родина. Культура аборигенов острова сильно пострадала от действий советских властей - им запрещалось говорить на родных языках и отмечать национальные праздники. Сейчас, когда языки уйльта и нивхов считаются исчезающими, как и сами народы, последние представители народов пытаются сохранить свою культуру и промыслы, находясь в тисках нефтегазовых компаний, государственных мегапроектов и меняющегося климата.

programme.title: Вечер
programme.desc: Самые интересные и важные события дня.

programme.title: Мосты Немцова
programme.desc: 27 февраля 2015 убили в центре Москвы убили Бориса Немцова. Прошло 10 лет с момента его убийства, но дело до сих пор не раскрыто. Мы запускаем подкаст "МОСТЫ НЕМЦОВА", чтобы ответить на вопросы: можно ли заниматься политикой и при этом оставаться человеком и насколько эта модель эффективна в России.Мы поговорили о Немцове с самыми разными людьми - членами его семьи, людьми с которыми он работал и с теми, кто лично не знал Немцова, но для которых он был и остается значимой политической фигурой.Мы назвали подкаст "Мосты Немцова", потому что нам кажется, что каждый жизненный этап Бориса Ефимовича — это некий переход с одного берега на другой - из физиков в гражданские активисты, из народных депутатов в губернаторы Нижегородской области, из регионального политика в федеральные, из правительства России в оппозицию.Мы расскажем о работе Немцова в Украине советником Виктора Ющенко, о выборах на пост мэра в Сочи, об участии акциях протеста и подготовке докладов, критикующих политику Путина. Об арестах Немцова и заключении под стражу и о последнем месте работы - депутатом Ярославской областной думы.

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Главные события стран центральной Азии.

programme.title: Америка
programme.desc: Ежедневная информационная программа в прямом эфире из студии в Вашингтоне.

programme.title: Вальхензе навсегда
programme.desc: В документальной семейной саге "Вальхензее навсегда" Янна Джи Вондерс предлагает нам вместе с ней изучить историю четырех поколений женщин ее семьи. Чтобы раскрыть семейные секреты, режиссер начинает свой путь от семейного кафе на баварском озере Вальхензее, а затем ведет зрителя через Мексику в Сан-Франциско времен "Лета любви", индийские ашрамы и немецкую коммуну, чтобы снова вернуться на Вальхензее. В фильме затрагиваются вопросы идентичности, корней и самореализации, поисков смысла жизни, любви и смерти. Это личная история о бесконечном цикле жизни.

programme.title: Интервью
programme.desc: Все о чем вы уже вкратце слышали в новостях, но хотели бы узнать подробности. Настоящее Время задает злободневные вопросы ключевым игрокам важных событий, беседует с известными политиками, узнает мнение компетентных аналитиков

programme.title: Tundmatu Venemaa
programme.desc: Труднодоступность населенного пункта иногда дает ему шанс на сохранение самобытности. Вот и старинное поморское село Колежма почти не меняется — столетие за столетием здесь живут в деревянных домах и занимаются рыбным промыслом. Сведения о том, когда именно в устье Колежмы стали селиться люди, сильно разнятся. Кто-то утверждает, что первое поселение здесь возникло в XII веке, во времена новгородской колонизации северных земель. Но в самой Колежме годом основания села считают 1540-й. Селение находится на северо-востоке Карелии, на побережье Онежской губы Белого моря. Это место называются также Лопским берегом. Всего километрах в 70-ти севернее находятся Соловецкие острова. Летом до них можно добраться на моторной лодке. Ну а в марте-апреле море еще сковано крепким льдом и засыпано снегом. Что не мешает местным рыбакам добывать здесь главную промысловую рыбу этих мест — навагу.

programme.title: Почти взрослые
programme.desc: Тропическая Африка - дом для множества видов диких животных. Когда детеныши попадают в беду или лишаются родительской заботы, им нужна помощь человека. В этом сериале вы познакомитесь с постояльцами реабилитационных центров и их опекунами, которые делают все возможное, чтобы зверята поскорее вернулись в дикую природу

programme.title: Почти взрослые
programme.desc: Местный поезд S-Bahn с грохотом проносится по Берлину и словно сквозь жизни Эмине, Мари, Кристиана и Артура. Их пути, скорее всего, никогда не пересекутся, но у них есть нечто общее: все они дети большого города. В течение года режиссер снимала повседневную жизнь своих юных подопечных. "Дети большого города".

programme.title: Балтия
programme.desc: Еженедельная информационная программа "Балтия" - непредвзятый взгляд на происходящее в Эстонии, Латвии и Литве. События, явления и люди в репортажах корреспондентов Настоящего Времени, работающих в регионе. Точная и беспристрастная информация, все точки зрения о происходящем в каждой из трех стран, входящих в Евросоюз и военный блок НАТО.

programme.title: Европа в фокусе
programme.desc: Актуальные события стран Европы.

programme.title: Дороги к свободе
programme.desc: Совместный проект Радио Свобода и украинской телекомпании "Эспрессо ТВ". В студии - Виталий Портников и его гости. Удастся ли Украине противостоять российской военной агрессии? Как будут развиваться отношения между народами Украины и России? Выстоит ли Украина?

programme.title: Грани времени
programme.desc: Итоги недели c Мумином Шакировым.

programme.title: Добровольцы
programme.desc: В 2014-2015 годах "Зоя" была добровольцем-медиком в "Госпитальерах", эвакуируя раненых с передовой. Позже сосредоточилась на вопросах адаптации ветеранов и защите прав женщин в армии. В 2022 году, взяв отпуск, снова отправилась на фронт — на этот раз, чтобы помочь "Лысому", который эвакуировал раненых во время Херсонской операции.

programme.title: Balti uudised
programme.desc: Ежедневная информационная программа "Балтия" – это непредвзятый взгляд на происходящее в Эстонии, Латвии и Литве. События, явления и люди в репортажах корреспондентов "Настоящего Времени", работающих в регионе. Точная и беспристрастная информация, все точки зрения о происходящем в каждой из трех стран, входящих в Евросоюз и военный блок НАТО.

programme.title: Интервью
programme.desc: Все о чем вы уже вкратце слышали в новостях, но хотели бы узнать подробности. Настоящее Время задает злободневные вопросы ключевым игрокам важных событий, беседует с изветсными политиками, узнает мнение компетентных аналитиков.

programme.title: Смотри в оба
programme.desc: "Смотри в оба" - проект о новостях и тех, кто эти новости делает. О фейках и сенсациях, о невольных ошибках и сознательных манипуляциях. Мы ищем информацию из разных источников, сравниваем и представляем на ваш суд.

programme.title: Поваренная книга журналиста
programme.desc: Дада Линделл проводит мастер-класс по работе с порталом Госзакупки - как искать тендеры и на что обращать внимание при анализе данных.

programme.title: Итоги
programme.desc: Еженедельная итоговая информационная программа из студии Голоса Америки в Вашингтоне.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: "Детали" - еженедельный телевизионный проект Русской службы "Голоса Америки", в котором ведущий Андрей Деркач рассказывает о научных открытиях и высокотехнологичных разработках в таких сферах, как медицина, космос, информационные технологии. Корреспонденты программы на себе испытывают новинки рынка hi-tech, общаются с создателями всего того, что делает нашу жизнь интереснее, безопаснее и удобнее.

programme.title: Беженцы. День из жизни
programme.desc: С какими трудностями сталкиваются те, кто был вынужден бросить все и бежать из родной страны? Десятки репортеров со всего мира сняли, каким был Международный день беженцев для тех, кто носит этот статус

programme.title: Добровольцы
programme.desc: В 2014-2015 годах "Зоя" была добровольцем-медиком в "Госпитальерах", эвакуируя раненых с передовой. Позже сосредоточилась на вопросах адаптации ветеранов и защите прав женщин в армии. В 2022 году, взяв отпуск, снова отправилась на фронт — на этот раз, чтобы помочь "Лысому", который эвакуировал раненых во время Херсонской операции.

programme.title: DW
programme.desc: Нико ЛАНГЕ - эксперт по безопасности, аналитик Мюнхенской конференции по безопасности

programme.title: Tundmatu Venemaa
programme.desc: Труднодоступность населенного пункта иногда дает ему шанс на сохранение самобытности. Вот и старинное поморское село Колежма почти не меняется — столетие за столетием здесь живут в деревянных домах и занимаются рыбным промыслом. Сведения о том, когда именно в устье Колежмы стали селиться люди, сильно разнятся. Кто-то утверждает, что первое поселение здесь возникло в XII веке, во времена новгородской колонизации северных земель. Но в самой Колежме годом основания села считают 1540-й. Селение находится на северо-востоке Карелии, на побережье Онежской губы Белого моря. Это место называются также Лопским берегом. Всего километрах в 70-ти севернее находятся Соловецкие острова. Летом до них можно добраться на моторной лодке. Ну а в марте-апреле море еще сковано крепким льдом и засыпано снегом. Что не мешает местным рыбакам добывать здесь главную промысловую рыбу этих мест — навагу.

programme.title: #Ukrainas
programme.desc: Семья Черняковых — жители Херсона. До полномасштабного вторжения Ольга работала в Херсонском управлении соцзащиты, её сын учился в колледже, а муж занимал должность заместителя руководителя управления кадров города. После оккупации левобережья Херсонщины соседи донесли российским военным, что племянник Ольги служит в ВСУ, а сама она якобы передаёт координаты российских войск и корректирует огонь. Вся семья оказалась в плену. Их пытали. В присутствии Ольги издевались над её сыном, требуя от него написать донос на мать. Ольгу вывезли из Херсона в оккупированное Новотроицкое, где её пытались вынудить отказаться от украинского гражданства. За 280 дней в изоляции она пережила семь сердечных приступов, получила серьёзные проблемы со зрением, спиной и коленями. После плена ей удалось выбраться на подконтрольную Украине территорию. Мужа и сына отпустили раньше, но семья так и не воссоединилась — россияне освободили родителей, но сына оставили в оккупации.

programme.title: Перекресток
programme.desc: На севере Сахалина проживает около 300 представителей народа уйльта и примерно 4000 нивхов. Сахалин для них - историческая родина. Культура аборигенов острова сильно пострадала от действий советских властей - им запрещалось говорить на родных языках и отмечать национальные праздники. Сейчас, когда языки уйльта и нивхов считаются исчезающими, как и сами народы, последние представители народов пытаются сохранить свою культуру и промыслы, находясь в тисках нефтегазовых компаний, государственных мегапроектов и меняющегося климата.

programme.title: Беженцы. День из жизни
programme.desc: С какими трудностями сталкиваются те, кто был вынужден бросить все и бежать из родной страны? Десятки репортеров со всего мира сняли, каким был Международный день беженцев для тех, кто носит этот статус

programme.title: Время человека
programme.desc: Героиня этой программы может дать урок каждому, как остаться верным себе и быть непохожим на остальных. Анастасия Бухреева живет в небольшом городке Лахеднопохья в Карелии. Еще в детстве ей поставили диагноз - алопеция. Это паралогическое выпадение волос. В подростковом возрасте Насте за то, что она выглядит не так, как большинство, сильно доставалось от сверстников. Тогда и началось её увлечение лошадьми. Сейчас Насте 40, она не стесняется себя и своей внешности, работает и продолжает заниматься конюшней. Только уже своей собственной. Этот выпуск расскажем о том, тяжело ли сейчас быть не такой как все в маленьком провинциальном городке.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: DW News is news and information channel from a German international broadcaster Deutsche Well (German Wall). It provides latest news from Europe and all around the world in several languages on a daily basis. The service is transmitted worldwide via satellite with a reach of more than 197 million people on a weekly basis. Their motto is Made for minds. DW news is informative, entertaining, up-to-date and what is even more important, reliable source of news, the content is intended to be independent of government influence.

programme.title: Rev
programme.desc: New thinking and technology are revolutionizing our cars, our cities, our way of life. Rev doesnt just want to know how fast we get from A to B, but how we get there as well. The world of cars and mobility is in flux. Rev casts a critical eye on new cars and examines climate-friendly solutions, looks into unusual new ideas and visions of the future. Take a spin through new possibilities every week with REV.

programme.title: In good shape
programme.desc: In Good Shape is the weekly health show on DW, entirely dedicated to health care. Find out everything about new medical treatments, alternative medicine, wellness, fitness, and nutrition. The shows hosts and guests discuss key topics with specialists, and offer opportunities to receive tips and tools for a healthy lifestyle directly from experts. Learn how natural remedies can help you stay healthier, how you can maintain a healthy diet, how to manage stress and how to improve your quality of life.

programme.title: Afrimaxx
programme.desc: The weekly lifestyle magazine searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture – from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel. The focus is on outstanding individuals doing extraordinary things on the African continent.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: DW News is news and information channel from a German international broadcaster Deutsche Well (German Wall). It provides latest news from Europe and all around the world in several languages on a daily basis. The service is transmitted worldwide via satellite with a reach of more than 197 million people on a weekly basis. Their motto is Made for minds. DW news is informative, entertaining, up-to-date and what is even more important, reliable source of news, the content is intended to be independent of government influence.

programme.title: Best of DW Vodcasts
programme.desc: Select DW podcasts enrich the program with current analyses of world politics and its influence on our daily lives. There will also be space in the program for lively discussions about social standards and taboos.

programme.title: Fokus Europa
programme.desc: The Polish government plans to build three nuclear reactors. Around 90 percent of Poles support going nuclear. +++ The COVID-19 pandemic has hit the Belgian healthcare system hard. The shortage of medical staff has not yet been solved.

programme.title: Eco Africa
programme.desc: Eco Africa highlights the innovative and inspiring projects from across Africa and Europe that are being put into practice in a a bid to tackle climate change and support our depleting environments. In Africa especially, huge numbers of animal and wildlife species have dramatically fallen, largely due to a vast increase in human population across the continent. The increasing population is taking over vast swathes of natural land and in turn, adding to the demand for natural resources. This series explores the different concepts being used to help sustain our future, such as alternative resources, biodiversity conservation and the future of travel.

programme.title: Eco India

programme.title: Planet A
programme.desc: Despite net-zero pledges, banks and asset managers, funds and governments continue to give trillions of dollars to the fossil fuel industry. Heres which interests and mechanisms are behind that - and how change the system for the better.

programme.title: Projekt Zukunft
programme.desc: Science show on DW provides its viewers a weekly dose of useful scientific information regarding various areas. If you are into cosmos and universe, then this show is made for you. programme.title: Where Are You? Missing Between Belarus and Poland
programme.desc: More and more people are taking the migratory route through Belarus - and disappearing without a trace. Relatives from their home countries, such as Iraq, Syria and Egypt, are looking for them. Polish volunteers offer their support in what is often a distressing endeavor.

programme.title: Arts Unveiled
programme.sub-title: Arts Unveiled: Experiencing and understanding the art world
programme.desc: Arts Unveiled dives deep into the international creative scene, uncovering new ideas and explaining cultural phenomena that shape our history, present and future. Who are the artists? What are their greatest works of art? And how are they having an impact? Where can we find their exciting projects?

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: 77 per cent of Africas population are below the age of thirty-five yet their interests are under-represented poltically and economically. This show aims to redress the balance by providing a voice to the largest demographic group on the continent. These dynamic younger people are politically engaged and will determine the future path their countries, and the continent as a whole, will follow in the twenty-first century. Presented by Eddy Micah Jr. from Ghana and Wanjiku Mwaura from Kenya, the show promotes a pan-African agenda by encouraging dialogue between the various interested parties. The show pulls no punches when delivering its compelling reports, personal accounts and provocative discussions. A long overdue look at the big issues that affect the youth of Africa.

programme.title: Transforming Business
programme.sub-title: Is it possible to transform asbestos waste into something useful?
programme.desc: Asbestos is banned in the EU and US, but despite its devastating impacts, many countries continue to use it. Now, a Dutch company claims it can recycle asbestos waste and repurpose it as a toxic-free partial replacement for cement, for use in the construction industry.

programme.title: The Power of Peatlands - Climate Protection from Moors
programme.desc: Peatlands bind more carbon than forests. But in Germany, almost all the countrys natural peatlands have been drained. Now, theyre emitting greenhouse gases. People around the world are currently working to rewet the moors - while keeping them usable for agriculture.

programme.title: When Night Falls in Chongqing - The Largest City in the World
programme.desc: Anyone can steal a handbag. But a business coup requires more: charisma, persuasiveness, tenacity and a lot of social savvy. Maybe its no wonder the white-collar perpetrators behind giant scams are difficult to catch.

programme.title: Elukoha paastmine
programme.desc: This reality TV show follows Marty Raney and his two children, Matt Raney and Misty Bilodeau, who are successful homesteaders from the state of Alaska and have the skills needed to fish, hunt, raise livestock, and otherwise survive in an untamed landscape. Struggling homesteaders across the country call these experts to help them save their homesteads and become self-sufficient while they teach them the necessary skills to survive the wilderness.

programme.title: Aardekutid
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Aardekutid
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. programme.title: Kõige ohtlikum saak
programme.desc: A documentary chronicling real life the adventures of one of the most deadliest professions in the world. Follow Alaskan crab fishermen as they face 40-foot waves and intense discomfort with freezing temperatures as they fish in the Bering sea. Sacrificing tooth and nail to catch the seasonal delicacies to later sell and trade on land. Witness the dangers these fisher men face as they battle against the sea, and experience how caution is a crucial part of staying alive.

programme.title: Automuujad
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers World Tour
programme.desc: Mike and Elvis hunt for Australias favourite pick up, the Hilux. Despite years of farm use, the boys aim to create the ultimate off-roading beast.

programme.title: Border Control
programme.desc: Discovery. Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Border Control
programme.desc: Discovery. The security and customs services at the border of Sweden are on constant watch to stop illegal items entering the country. Its their job to detect crime.

programme.title: Paastemehed
programme.desc: Mike Whiteside and Robert Kulp are the hosts of Salvage Dawgs show that is about saving beautiful old things from buildings planned to be torn down. They and their talented crew teach the viewers how to repurpose old stuff into something new and useful instead of throwing it away. So if you are remodeling your home think twice before you get rid of anything. Get creative, have some fun and learn tips and tricks to help you build your skills. Learn how to transform old chairs into a functional bench, how to repurpose an old paneled door into a shelf and enjoy fantastic vintage pieces from the past.

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: To say expert British mechanic Ant Anstead is a lover of cars would be an understatement. The term petrol head does not quite cover the passion he exudes for motor vehicles. One of the vehicles that Ant has a particular obsession with is the 1930s Alfa Romeo 158 Grand Prix race car, one of the greatest racers ever made, which he is honouring in this documentary series by building his own from scratch. We follow Ant and his Alfa on their journey from workshop to race circuit, as he overcomes challenges, setbacks and deadlines to get this commemorative racer ready in time.

programme.title: Marooned with Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Adrenaline-filled documentary series in which Ed Stafford, British explorer and adventurer, travels to remote destinations and some of the worlds toughest environments to see if he can survive there on his own, without even essential equipment such as clothes, food, and tools. He can only take his camera, an emergency satellite phone and an emergency medical kit. Staffords goal is to see if he can not only survive, but prosper under these extreme conditions, pushing his body and mind to the limit.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers World Tour
programme.desc: In their most ambitious project yet, Mike and Elvis aim to build a tribute to Paddy Hopkirks winning 1964 Mini Cooper. Will it cross the finish line?

programme.title: Asphalt Cowboys
programme.desc: Hauling a heavy load in gigantic trucks is no joke, and this reality series follows truckers, also known as asphalt cowboys, as they earn their money transporting heavy goods across the European continent. Battling the elements, strict time constraints, and the loneliness of being away from home, these truckers fire up their engines and waste no time on the road, ensuring their clients goods arrive on time and in one piece!

programme.title: Asphalt Cowboys
programme.desc: Hauling a heavy load in gigantic trucks is no joke, and this reality series follows truckers, also known as asphalt cowboys, as they earn their money transporting heavy goods across the European continent. Battling the elements, strict time constraints, and the loneliness of being away from home, these truckers fire up their engines and waste no time on the road, ensuring their clients goods arrive on time and in one piece!

programme.title: Mighty Truckers
programme.desc: This real-life road show follows the lives of twenty truckers from four different countries - Poland, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands. These unique and diverse characters will show the viewers the world of transport, introducing them with the profession of "truck driver". Who are these men and women who ensure that we get various goods on time day and night? What makes them choose the life on the road? This show will answer these questions in an "up close and personal" portrait of trucker life.

programme.title: Mighty Truckers
programme.desc: This real-life road show follows the lives of twenty truckers from four different countries - Poland, Italy, Germany and the Netherlands. These unique and diverse characters will show the viewers the world of transport, introducing them with the profession of "truck driver". Who are these men and women who ensure that we get various goods on time day and night? What makes them choose the life on the road? This show will answer these questions in an "up close and personal" portrait of trucker life.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters

programme.title: Kullapalavik
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Did you know that Australia accounts for over 95% of the worlds supply of opal? Well, these miners do, and in this documentary series we follow groups of brave and persevering souls as they scour the land in search of the precious and highly valuable gemstone. With many of the mines located in the desolately deserted Outback, the crews must face some of Australias most treacherous landscapes if they are to hit the jackpot. The six crews have to weigh up the consequences in these old and hazardous mines, often risking their lives in search of opal wealth, not to mention preventing opportunistic thieves from snatching their hauls.

programme.title: Pagasi lahingud
programme.desc: In the Sunshine State, Billy seeks a big payday from a buyer in need of a collectible car, while the Martins and Mark look for cheap vehicles to flip for big profits.

programme.title: Pagasi lahingud
programme.desc: Featuring professional buyers including antique dealers, a production designer and an eCommerce expert, these expert buyers travel around the world to lost baggage auctions, estate auctions and police auctions to find the hidden treasure and items left behind or siezed by customs in order to make the greatest profit. This American docu-reality series created by The Travel Channel in 2012. Finding contents in baggage such as a bronze sculpture, jewellery including 18 karat gold and a legendary belt, these professionals prove why they have a name for themselves in their industry, finding hidden gems in hidden places.

programme.title: Border Control
programme.desc: Going through customs can be a stressful experience for most people, even more so if youre attempting to smuggle drugs or weapons into the country. Follow the efforts of the Security and Customs Services at the border of Spain, as they work hard to keep their country safe from criminals. Whether its drugs, weapons or even terrorism, theres a lot of things security have to consider in order to make sure all threats are handled properly. These security forces are always hot on the trail of suspicious activity, in the air, on land or away at sea.

programme.title: Border Control
programme.desc: Going through customs can be a stressful experience for most people, even more so if youre attempting to smuggle drugs or weapons into the country. programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Aardekutid
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Elukoha paastmine
programme.desc: This reality TV show follows Marty Raney and his two children, Matt Raney and Misty Bilodeau, who are successful homesteaders from the state of Alaska and have the skills needed to fish, hunt, raise livestock, and otherwise survive in an untamed landscape. Struggling homesteaders across the country call these experts to help them save their homesteads and become self-sufficient while they teach them the necessary skills to survive the wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Sofia see esimene
programme.desc: Rukoveti, horske svite Stevana Stojanovića Mokranjca, predstavljaju stub srpskog muzičkog stvaralaštva. Rukovet u narodu označava venac od najlepšeg cveća koji devojka plete za svog dragog. Ova poetizovana simbolika označava način Mokranjčevog kompozitorskog rada, on je birao najlepše pesme, povezivao ih u skladan buket, organski sklopljen da označi lepotu pesme ovih krajeva. Mokranjčeve Rukoveti gledamo u izvođenju Hora RTS-a, na koncertu snimljenom u okviru 46. Bemusa.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Childrens series - Ep. 144. We follow the adventures of a lovable and six-year-old puppy who lives with her dad, mum and four-year-old little sister, Bingo. Bluey uses her limitless energy to play games that unfold in unpredictable and hilarious ways.

programme.title: Tim Kliphuis and the NCO
programme.sub-title: Tim Kliphuis and the NCO: The Changing Seasons
programme.desc: The Netherlands Chamber Orchestra commissioned violinist Tim Kliphuis, internationally known for his genre-crossing approach to music, to write a new version of Antonio Vivaldis Four Seasons. Kliphuis choose to take improvisation as his starting point; at the same time, he intended to leave the best-known Vivaldi themes and chords in, as they give the piece its wonderful energy. The result is a fresh and exciting interpretation that never loses sight of the original. Each season has a different character: the freshness of spring is reflected by the use of Irish and Norwegian traditional music; the summer heat can be heard in the American jazz and funk rhythms; the autumn includes a galloping safari hunt in South-Africa and the ice-cold winter warms up with the energy of Russian gypsy music. For each movement, Kliphuis has a metropole in mind which he visited on his previous concert tours. Youre about to witness a truly genre-crossing spectacle!

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Jazzwoche Burghausen
programme.desc: Every year since 1970, the German city of Burghausen has been hosting one of the largest jazz festivals in the world. During Burghausen International Jazz Week, Burghausen becomes a Bavarian jazz mecca: guests from all over the world join the Burghausers to enjoy the most wonderful jazz performances as the colorful hustle and bustle of spectators and musicians shake up the city. One of the bands performing here in 2019 is the Hypnotic Brass Ensemble, which consists of eight sons of jazz trumpeter and one-time Sun Ra Arkestra member Phil Cohran. He trained his children to play their horns and instilled in them a profound sense of the deeply spiritual roots of the music. The Hypnotic Brass Ensembles music ranges from hypnotizing grooves to jazzy funk.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. Back in 1982, legendary jazz clarinettist Benny Goodman performed at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague with his septet. The "King of Swing" revisited the atmosphere of the 1930s, when jazz enjoyed tremendous popularity.

programme.title: TorTube
programme.desc: Jazz fans in television land have come to the right place for their dose of first-rate world jazz: TorTube! Jazz club De Tor in Enschede is one of Europes most authentic jazz venues, with an absolutely unique ambiance. Some of the best musicians from Holland and the rest of the world find their way to De Tor to perform for an appreciative audience of jazz fans. This episode of TorTube entitled Vagen, features iconic Swedish jazz pianist Martin Tingvall and his trio. Tingvall has a knack for writing bright melodies that sound like they have been around for ages. During the Tingvall Trios performance at De Tor in Enschede, the bands irresistible grooves reveal drummer Jurgen Spiegels rock and hip hop background, and double bass player Omar Rodriguez Calvos Cuban heritage.

programme.title: Jungle By Night - Jazz in Duketown
programme.desc: Jazz in Duketown is the largest free outdoor jazz festival in the Netherlands. Its a real gathering for jazz addicts, inviting internationally renowned bands. In 2019, one of them is the Amsterdam-based Dutch instrumental collective Jungle by Night. The band plays a mix of various styles, inspired by funk, jazz, dub, rock and others. The ensemble made its debut in 2010 and has played at numerous festivals. Their December 2010 performance with former backing musicians of Afrobeat founder Fela Kuti in Paris saw them hailed as "the future of Afrobeat".

programme.title: Da Pá Virada Sessions
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed and curated in Sao Paulo by director and presenter Dani Gurgel and producer and engineer Thiago Rabello, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. Influenced by the music of the past and present, samba collective Samba pros Orixás bridges the gap between tradition and modernity. Naturally, Samba pros Orixás repertoire is dominated by sambas, alongside ijexás, jongos, samba de roda, and numerous other infectious Brazilian rhythms that will make you want to move. Dont miss out their tour-de-force performance!

programme.title: jazzahead! 2023
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2023, jazzahead! paid special attention to Germanys jazz scene and invited thirty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. Among the artists presenting themselves at jazzahead! 2023 is Belgian-Japanese piano wizard Alex Koo. In his brand new Etudes for Piano, composed for and commissioned by BOZAR Brussels, he shows how his passion for jazz and classical music merge perfectly, like a marriage between Debussy, Chopin, Reich, and Rachmaninov on the one hand, and Keith Jarrett, Craig Taborn, Brian Eno, and Philip Glass on the other.

programme.title: jazzahead! 2022
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2022, jazzahead! paid special attention to Canadas jazz scene and invited forty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. One of the ensembles appearing at jazzahead! 2022 is baritone saxophonist and composer Kira Linns sextet, consisting of three wind instruments and a rhythm section. The band combines the acoustic sound of various wind instruments with the electronic sound of electric bass, synthesizers and Rhodes and electronic effects. Composer Kira Linn (on baritone saxophone and bass clarinet) is accompanied by Nino Wenger (alto saxophone, flute), Christopher Kunz (tenor and soprano saxophone), keyboardist Lukas GroSSmann, electric bassist Freek Mulder, and drummer Johannes Koch.

programme.title: Paradox Live
programme.desc: Innovative contemporary jazz and improvised music, the search for modernity, mind blowing sounds, rock and pop… Indeed PARADOX Tilburg goes beyond jazz, crossing musical boundaries into the unknown soundscapes of electronic music. Indie artists, blues veterans and jazz superstars all pour their hearts and souls at the Paradox. From young, local talents to top national and international artists, PARADOX Tilburg is the most intimate jazz club in the Netherlands, with a devoted audience from all across Europe. In their TV show PARADOX LIVE you get a taste of the greatest concerts and interviews with artists from all around the world. This episode of PARADOX LIVE presents the talented Dutch drummer Philippe Lemm with his trio.

programme.title: Naima
programme.desc: Explore the music of one of the most influential and innovative saxophonists in jazz history: John Coltrane! Immerse yourself in this collection of remarkable performances from the early 1960s that showcase Coltranes unparalleled artistry and unique sound during a transformative period in the artists career. Recorded in various European cities, Coltrane is seen playing the songs "Autumn Leaves", "Hackensack", "My Favorite Things", "I Want To Talk About You", "Vigil", and "Naima". Tune in and experience why the music of John Coltrane has touched the lives of so many!

programme.title: jazzahead! 2023 interview
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals give a good impression of the jazz world. Both famous and less famous jazz artists will give a new insight in their life. DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that special song, what was the first record they bought and what is his or her most precious musical memory. The festival portraits are beautiful reports filmed at the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the memory of the festival, the music and the experience.

programme.title: Teus Nobel live at the Bimhuis Amsterdam
programme.desc: Teus Nobel is a Dutch trumpet and flugelhorn player. As a little boy, he was inspired by "power" trumpeters such as Maynard Ferguson and Bill Chase. While studying at the conservatory, he played both as jazz player and as a commercial session musician at musicals. After his time at the conservatory, he started playing in the Royal Netherlands Air Force Orchestra, playing march music influenced by pop and jazz. Todays broadcast was recorded at the Amsterdam BIMhuis. Teus dedicates his compositions to his all-time heroes Jarmo Hoogendijk, Woody Shaw, Christian Scott, Roy Hargrove and Eric Vloeimans. This performance is based on his second album Legacy.

programme.title: Georgie Fame and the Blue Flames
programme.desc: Georgie Fame, known for "Yeh, Yeh" and "The Ballad of Bonnie and Clyde" makes a triumphant comeback with The Blue Flames. Georgie Fame and the Blue Flames was a popular band in the UK in the 60s, celebrated for its RandB, soul, jazz, ska, and pop sounds. The training was largely inspired by ska, a popular musical style in Jamaican cafes in London at the time. It was the song "Green Onions" from the Booker T and The MG that inspired Georgie to incorporate the Hammond organ into her compositions. This performance by Georgie Fame and the Blue Flames is brimming with blues and soulful sounds that will delight the groups old and new fans.

programme.title: Portrait of Roy Ayers
programme.desc: "The legend of the groove" is a series of documentaries devoted to the musicians who were most influential on contemporary hip hop, soul, rhythm n blues, and on the course of history. Between the late 1950s and now, these musicians radically changed music. Although sometimes hardly in the public eye, they have all been major sources of inspiration for todays major artists: Prince, Erykah Badu, Janis Joplin and Jimi Hendrix.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Tango Extremo
programme.sub-title: Tango Extremo: Tango on the Tundra
programme.desc: Five musicians, in excess of 3000 miles, nine concerts, in thirteen days: in November 2015, the five-piece ensemble "Tango Extremo" left the confines of its hometown, the Dutch city of The Hague, to travel through Russia. On the musicians jam-packed itinerary were performances in Moscow, Novosibirsk, Saratov, Tomsk, and Barnaul. There, the ensemble collaborated with a local classical orchestra, the members taught workshops, and travelled countless miles by busses, planes, and trains. The warm welcome of the Russian audiences made up for the icy Siberian colds of the journey. The Dutch reporter Herman Nanninga was on hand to document this gargantuan tour of Russia in his film Tango on the Tundra.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. The 2018 edition of WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Vishten, has been animating audiences for 15 years with its fiery blend of traditional French songs and original instrumentals fusing Celtic, Acadian and contemporary folk influences with energetic virtuosity. The trio comprises multi-instrumentalists Emmanuelle and Pastelle LeBlanc from Prince Edward Island and Pascal Miousse from the Magdalen Islands.

programme.title: Jong Metropole live at Radio Kootwijk
programme.desc: Jong Metropole (Young Metropole) is a unique collaboration between the Dutch Metropole Orchestra, the National Youth Orchestra of the Netherlands and the National Jazz Youth Orchestra of the Netherlands. It aims to prepare talented, young musicians in classical and light music for a professional career. Jong Metropole blends the best of different music genres, borrowing from the performance strength of classical strings to the swing, improvisation, and timing of jazz, and more. Conducted by Christian Elsasser, this special performance was recorded at the former radio transmission station, Kootwijk.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Milt Jacksons Modern Jazz Quartet at the Bozar
programme.desc: The Modern Jazz Quartet (MJQ) was composed of Milt "Bags" Jackson on vibraphone, John Lewis on piano, Percy Heath on bass, and Connie Kay on drums. Milt Jackson and John Lewis were pioneer bebop musicians who had played together in Dizzy Gillespies 1948 big band. They pursued separate careers before adding Heath and Lewis to form the Modern Jazz Quartet in the 1950s. Noted for its delicate percussion sonorities, innovative jazz forms, and high performance standards, the MJQ was an immensely popular jazz and "third stream" ensemble until its final concerts in the early 1990s.

programme.title: Da Pá Virada Sessions
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed in Sao Paulo, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. One of the artists taking part in this series is pianist Hercules Gomes. Due to his impressive technical skill and expressive choice of repertoire he is considered one of Brazils foremost pianists today. Hercules has performed with numerous renowned Brazilian musicians, including Arismar do Espirito Santo, Letieres Leite, Alessandro Penezzi, Wilson das Neves, and Banda Mantiqueira.

programme.title: Smith, Adderley, Brubeck, Mingus - Newport Jazz F.
programme.desc: The Newport Jazz Festival, first established in the North-American town of Newport, Rhode Island in the summer of 1954, has now grown to become one of the largest multi-day celebrations of jazz worldwide. It has resulted in numerous famous live albums from top-rate jazz stars, and has spawned several worldwide tours, including editions of the Newport Jazz Festival in Rotterdam, The Netherlands. In October 1972, an outstanding lineup played shoulder-to-shoulder at the 7th Newport Jazz Festival held in Rotterdams then-recently built concert venue De Doelen. These four masterful groups consisted of alto saxophonist "Cannonball" Adderley and his quintet (Nat Adderley on cornet, George Duke on keyboards, Walter Booker on bass, and Roy McCurdy on drums), Hammond organist Jimmy Smith and his band (Art Farmer on flugelhorn, Illinois Jacquet on tenor saxophone, Kenny Burrell on guitar, Clark Terry on trumpet, and Roy Haynes on drums), pianist Dave Brubeck and his trio (Jack Six on bass, Alan Dawson on drums) with accompaniment from Paul Desmond on alto saxophone and Gerry Mulligan on baritone saxophone, and bassist Charles Mingus and his group (Joe Gardner on trumpet, Hamiet Bluiett on baritone saxophone, John Foster on piano, Roy Brooks on drums) with the great high-note trumpeter Cat Anderson as a guest.

programme.title: Estival Jazz Lugano
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. The Crusaders, an American jazz fusion group that was popular in the 70s employed a two-manned front-line horn section. The groups sound was rooted in hard bop, with an emphasis on RandB and soul. Their performance at Estival is beyond soulful and an amazing show to watch.

programme.title: Scott DuBois Quartet Live In Munich
programme.desc: Rising star of the jazz guitar Scott DuBois leads his quartet, consisting of Gebhard Ullmann (reeds), Thomas Morgan (bass), and Kresten Osgood (drums), in an intimate and atmospheric performance at Munichs Jazz Club Unterfahrt in March 2016. The groups telepathy is such that they are able to go from deathly quiet to fiercely avant-garde at the drop of a hat. For this occasion, DuBois and his group gave a full performance of his "Winter Light" album, released a few months earlier, plus his Lake Shore Suite.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Under the Surface - Live at Bimhuis 2018
programme.desc: Under the Surface is an improvisational jazz band formed by drummer Joost Lijbaart, vocalist Sanne Rambags, and guitarist Bram Stadhouders. Sanne Rambags, the youngest artist of the trio, is one of the few vocalists of her generation who able to improvise effortlessly, be it by using her voice as an instrument blending with the sounds of the band, or by performing her own poetry. Joost Lijbaart, known from bands by Yuri Honing, is one of the top artists of the Dutch jazz scene. Guitarist Bram Stadhouders is one of the most renowned musicians of improvisational music in Europe. Together, the three Dutch musicians have developed their own "universal language" within the genre. Their performance at Bimhuis showcases their unique intergenerational chemistry and hypnotizing sound. Bimhuis Amsterdam provides a platform for pioneering national and international musicians by hosting over 300 concerts a year.

They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.
