programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Annalise ja ta tudengid on rabatud, kui kuulevad midagi Wallace Mahoney mõrva kohta.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Annalise ja ta tudengid hakkavad kaitsma uhe pere lapsi, keda suudistatakse oma ema mõrva planeerimises.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Annalise ja Bonnie poorduvad abi saamiseks ootamatu allika poole, mis tekitab ta tudengite seas pingeid.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Annalise saab vihje suudistaja Atwoodi kohta, mille tulemuseks on tuline vaidlus Nateiga.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Annalisei ahvardab vangistus suutamise ja mõrva eest. Prokuratuur kogub Annalisei vastu asitõendeid ja politsei uurib, mis Wesiga tulekahju õhtul juhtus. Tudengid uritavad leppida kohutava tõsiasjaga, et uks nende hulgast on surnud.

programme.title: Kaitseingel on langenud
programme.desc: USA 2019 põnevusmarul. Mike Banning annab riigiteenistuses endast kõik. Tema peamine ulesanne on USA presidendi julgeoleku tagamine. Banning, pikka aega presidenti kaitsnud ning julgeolekususteemiga labi ja lõhki tuttav, ajab suurte terroriruhmituste kavatsused korduvalt luhta. Seekord on terroristid aga sepitsenud marksa nutikama plaani: targast salateenistuse agendist iga hinna eest vabaneda.Saanud terroristide kõige ohtlikumaks sihtmargiks, kirjutab Banning alla oma surmaotsusele: teda suudistatakse USA presidendi elu kallale kippumises. Vanad relvavennad ei usalda teda, sest kahtlustavad, et ta kavatseb presidendi tappa. Et paasta oma hea nimi ja eelkõige elu, peab Banning valja uurima, kes ja miks mangib tema ja presidendiga saatanlikku mangu. Agent oletab, et seekord on terroristidel plaan õhkida riigipea lennuk. Lavastaja:Ric Roman Waugh Osades:Gerard Butler, Lance Reddick, Morgan Freeman, Piper Perabo, Jada Pinkett-Smith, Nick Nolte, Tim Blake Nelson, Danny Huston

programme.title: Lennuplaan
programme.desc: USA 2005 põnevik Lavastaja: Robert Schwentke Osades: Jodie Foster, Peter Sarsgaard, Sean Bean, Kate Beahan, Michael Irby Kassahitist põnevusfilm Kylest (Jodie Foster), kes ilmselt ainukesena usub, et tema kuueaastane tutar astus koos temaga lennuki pardale, aga on nuud kadunud. Kyle sõidab koos oma tutrega Berliinist New Yorki. Masenduses oma mehe surmast, vajub Kyle mõttesse kuid toibununa markab, et tema tutar on kadunud. Keegi peale Kylei ei taha uskuda, et laps uldse pardale tuli. Ema on murest hullumas kuid peab uksi selle mõistatuse lahendama ja tutre paastma, maksku see, mis maksab.

programme.title: Tagasi tulevikku III
programme.desc: USA 1990 ulme/seikluskomoodia Lavastaja:Robert Zemeckis Osades: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen Kuulsa triloogia viimane peatukk viib meie erinevates ajaperioodides randava sõbra Marty McFly (Michael J. Fox) Metsikusse Laande, kus elatakse aastas 1885 ja kus on end mugavasti sisse seadnud ka Marty sõber Doc Brown (Christopher Lloyd). Sinna jõudes peab ta paastma Doci viimase peale vihavaenu pidava Tanneni klanni kaest ja samal ajal muretsema, kuidas paaseda tagasi olevikku, sest tema ajamasinast sportauto on selle rannaku kaigus tõsiseid vigastusi saanud.

programme.title: Kruudid
programme.desc: USA 2013 animakomoodia. EESTI KEELES! "Kruudid" on seikluskomoodia, mis viib meid tagasi eelajaloolistesse aegadesse ning mille keskmes on maailma esimene perekond, kes asuvad uskumatule teekonnale parast seda, kui ootamatult havib koobas, mis neid seni ohtude eest kaitsnud on. Rannates labi suursuguste ja kaunite kohtade avastavad Kruudid uue, hammastava maailma, mis tulvil fantastilistest olenditest ning nende suhtumine umbritsevasse muutub igaveseks. Lavastajad: Chris Sanders ja Kirk DeMicco Osades (haaled): Marilyn Jurman, Mait Malmsten, Ita Ever, Jim Ashilevi, Kait Kall ja Eva Pussa.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: USA 2015 seiklusfantaasia. Costa Rica ranniku lahedal asuv luksuslik kuurort Jurassic World pakub elupaika mitmele geneetiliselt loodud dinosaurusele, kelle seas on ka jõhker ja arukas Indominus Rex. Kui see hiiglaslik elukas põgeneb, saab alguse ahelreaktsioon, mis teised dinosaurused hulluma paneb. Nuud peab uks erusõjavaelane koos loomaeksperdiga oma eriliste oskuste abil kaks noort venda ja ulejaanud turistid meeletu eelajaloolise runnaku eest paastma. Lavastaja: Colin Trevorrow Osades: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Irrfan Khan, Vincent DOnofrio, Ty Simpkins ja teised

programme.title: Minu pirakas Kreeka pulm 3
programme.desc: Parast perekonna patriarhi surma otsib Toula ules oma isa lapsepõlvesõbrad ja peagi sõidab perekond Portokalos Kreekasse sudantsoojendavale perekohtumisele, mis on tais armastust, keerdkaike ja poordeid.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: USA 2014 animakomoodia Lavastajad: Eric Darnell, Simon J. Smith Osades (haaled): Uues lustakas animafilmis ʺMadagaskari pingviinidʺ avastab publik globaalse spioonivõrgustiku kõige meelelahutuslikuma ning samas kõige salaparasema kvartetiga seotud saladused. Skipper, Kowalski, Rico ja Reamees peavad oma uues, peadpooritavas seikluses uhendama jõud šiki ja noobli salateenistusega, mis kannab nime Põhjatuul ning mille eesotsas on Agent Salajane (me võime teile ju tema nime paljastada, aga siis... noh, teate ju kull). Seda kõike selleks, et nurjata salakavala kurikaela Dr. Octavius Brinei maailmavallutusplaanid.

programme.title: Kiired ja vihased 7
programme.desc: USA | Hiina | Jaapan | Kanada | Araabia Ühendemiraadid 2015 marul Lavastaja:James Wan Osades:Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson Dominic (Vin Diesel) arvas koos oma tiimiga, et on kriminaalsest palgasõduri elust loobunud. Nad alistasid rahvusvahelise terroristi Owen Shaw ning laksid kõik oma teed. Ent nuud asub Shaw vend Deckard kattemaksuks ukshaaval tiimi liikmeid tapma. Lisaks uritavad Somaalia terrorist Jakarde ja uks rapane valitsusametnik uksteise võidu varastada arvutiprogrammi Jumala Silm, mis võib mistahes tehnoloogilise seadme relvaks muuta. Torretto peab oma kamba uuesti kokku ajama, et Shaw peatada ja Jumala Silm enda katte saada, olles samas kistud võimuvõitlusesse terroristi ja USA valitsuse vahel.

programme.title: Luurespetsid
programme.desc: USA/ Hiina 2016 komoodia/ marul Lavastaja:Rawson Marshall Thurber Osades:Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart, Amy Ryan, Aaron Paul Calvin Joyner (Kevin Hart) oli oma kooli au ja uhkus. Kakskummend aastat hiljem on ta edukas raamatupidaja, kes on ullatunud, kui temaga võtab uhendust Bob Stone. Selgub, et tegelikult on tegu Robbie Wheirdichtiga (Dwayne Johnson), keda teismelisena nende koolis kiusati. Bob on kakskummend aastat trenni teinud ning on nuud tahtis CIA agent. Ta palkab Calvini appi, et leida ta raamatupidamisoskuse abil seade, mis võib USA luurele havitavalt mõjuda. Ebatavaline paar jaab vastase relvadele ja arvukusele alla, ent suudab nad siiski ule kavaldada.

programme.title: Ma tahan sind tagasi
programme.desc: Äsja oma kaaslaste poolt maha jaetud kolmekumnendates Peter ja Emma moodustavad tiimi, et saboteerida oma endiste kallimate uusi suhteid ja võita nad lõplikult tagasi.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Annalise jõuab murdumispunkti, kui proovib harjuda eluga trellide taga. Wesi mõrvaga seotud ullatav ulestunnistus võib kõike muuta. Keatingi neliku vabadus on ohus, kui nad avastavad, et prokurori juurdlus on palju suurem, kui nad oskasid ette kujutada.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Kohtusaalis on pinge laes, sest prokuratuur tahab esitada Annaliseile uue suudistuse.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Abitu Annalise vannub, et maksab Denverile ja Atwoodile katte.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Annalise proovib ara hoida ullatavat uut lahenemist prokuratuuri juhtumis.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: Annalise ja Keatingi nelik kompavad piire, kui kaugele nad on valmis endi paastmiseks minema.

programme.title: Ullikese paradiis
programme.desc: Armastuse jarele õhkavast ullikesest saab kogemata kuulsus, kuid ainult selleks, et see kõik taas kaotada.

programme.title: Ernest ja Celestine 2
programme.desc: Ernest ja Celestine naasevad Ernesti maale, et parandada tema katkine viiul. Seal olles aga avastavad nad, et muusika on kogu riigis keelatud. Nad puuavad seda ebaõiglust parandada, et tuua karumaale tagasi rõõm.

programme.title: Joomapidu
programme.desc: Tume komoodia maailmast, kus narkootikumid ja alkohol on illegaalsed, kuid uhel paeval aastas võivad kõik tagajargedele mõtlemata end vabaks lasta ja kõike tarvitada. Kolm kaheksateistkumneaastast on otsustanud just seda teha.

programme.title: Kuidas Grinch jõulud varastas
programme.desc: USA-Saksamaa 2000 jõulukomoodia Lavastaja:Ron Howard Osades:Jim Carrey, Jeffrey Tambor, Christine Baranski Grinch (Jim Carrey) on karvane roheline olevus, kes elab Kellekula kohal kõrguva Mornimae sisemuses asuvas koopas. Kui maailmas on midagi, mida Grinch ei salli, siis on selleks jõulud. Saatjaks vaid ta truu koer Max, on Grinch mõelnud valja plaani, kuidas lahenevad jõulud Kellekulas kõigile meelde jaaks. Ta kavatseb varastada kogu linnast kõik kingitused, sest mis jõulud need ilma kingitusteta ikka on? Film kandideeris kolmele Oscarile, võites parima grimmi kategoorias.

programme.title: Kutt ja kaks kuningannat
programme.desc: USA 2016 seiklusmarul. Kuri Ravenna (Charlize Theron) saab teada, et ta õde, kuninganna Freya (Emily Blunt), on rase ja armastab uht ulikut. Freya sunnitab vaikse tudruku, ent ta armuke tapab beebi. Freya raev vallandab jaised võluvõimed ning ta tapab mehe. Freya randab põhja, et ehitada loss ning panna kokku armee, mis rooviks lapsi ja kasvataks neist halastamatud sõdalased. Aastad mooduvad ja Eric (Chris Hemsworth) ning Sara (Jessica Chastain) on suureks kasvanud ning uksteisesse armunud. Nad plaanivad lossist põgeneda, ent Freya ehitab nende vahele jaast seina. Ühel paeval jaab Lumivalgeke haigeks ning ta abikaasa otsib Ericut, et oelda talle, et võlupeegel laks kaduma teel paika nimega Varjupaik. Eric liitub kahe harjapõlvlasega, et peegel ules otsida, ent nende missiooni saadavad ohud. Lavastaja:Cedric Nicolas-Troyan Osades:Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Jessica Chastain, Emily Blunt, Nick Frost

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Siit me tuleme taas
programme.desc: Ole valmis laulma ja tantsima, nutma ja naerma – ulemaailmselt armastatud muusikalifilmi Mamma Mia! teine osa on unustamatu tunderikas muusikamoll armastatud ABBA laulude rutmis. On moodunud 10 aastat ajast, mil viimati paikeselisel Kalokairi saarel ABBA laulude pillerkaarist osa saime. Heatuju-filmil Mamma Mia! on aeg tulla taas! Ühine selle naerust rõkkava tantsu- ja laulupeoga ning saa teada, kuidas armastatud kangelanna Donna imeline Kreeka-seiklus alguse sai. Loobunud suurlinna elust naaseb Donna tutar Sophie (Amanda Seyfried) imekaunile Kreeka saarele, et valmistada ette uue hotelli avamine. Pidustuste eelse sagina kaigus mõistab Sophie, et on lapseootel. Segaste tunnete tulvas avanevad malestustelaekad ning Sophie saab teada nii mõndagi armsa ema Donna minevikust. Miks noor Donna kunagi Kreekasse laks, millised olid tema suured unistused ning romantilised seiklused Billi, Harry ja Samiga. Ootamatult selgub, et hotelli avapeo toimumine on suure kusimargi all, kuid just siis hakkavad saabuma kulalised. Meeletu trallipidu saab hoo sisse ja ullatusi jagub kõigile.

programme.title: Megameel vs Hukatuse sundikaat
programme.desc: Megameele endine kurikaelte meeskond Hukatuse sundikaat on naasnud. Äsja kroonitud kangelane Megameel peab nuud jatkama kurja kaitumist, kuni ta suudab oma sõbrad kokku kutsuda, et takistada oma endisi kurje meeskonnakaaslasi Metro Cityt kuule lennutamast.

programme.title: Kiired ja vihased 4
programme.desc: USA / Jaapan 2009 marul Lavastaja:Justin Lin Osades: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez Kui kuritegu toob nad tagasi kodusesse Los Angelesse, loob põgenik Dominic Toretto (Vin Diesel) ja agent Brian OConneri (Paul Walker) vahel lõkkele vana vihavaen. Ent seistes vastamisi uhise vaenlasega, peavad Dom ja Brian leidma võimaluse teineteist kuidagi usaldada, et valjuda valjapaasmatuna tunduvast olukorrast võitjatena. Võimsad autod ja hulljulged tagaajamised viivad nad LA tanavatelt Mehhiko tolmustele maanteedele ning kiirus ei lange hetkeksi allapoole lubatud piiri!

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: USA, Suurbritannia, Island 2015 seiklus marul Lavastaja:Baltasar Kormákur Osades:Jason Clarke, Keira Knightley, Jake Gyllenhaal, Josh Brolin, Simon Harrison 1996. a 10. mai hommikul alustavad kahe kommertsliku ekspeditsiooni magironijad viimast tõusu Mount Everesti tipu suunas, mis on Maa kõrgeimaks punktiks. Ootamatult tabab aga mage vagivaldne maru, mis mahib seiklejad lumetormi sisse, millest tugevamat pole varem nahtud. Kõige jubedamates tingimustes peavad magironijad elama ule napistava tuule ja ulimadalad temperatuurid, uritades vageva lahingu kaigus lootusetus olukorras ellu jaada.

programme.title: Vapustav nelik
programme.desc: Lõbus lugu kahest pikaaegsest sõbrannast, kes võtavad ette reisi, et olla pruutneitsid kolledžiaegse sõbranna ullatuspulmas. Selle poorase reisi jooksul soojendatakse sõprussuhteid, minevik kerkib uuesti paevakorda ning on piisavalt sademeid, seksi ja romantikat, et muuta kõigi elu ootamatul viisil. Peaosades Susan Sarandon ja Bette Midler.

programme.title: Kuidas mõrvast puhtalt paaseda
programme.desc: How to Get Away with Murder is an American crime drama series starring Viola Davis. The story follows Annalise Keating. a criminal defense lawyer and professor at the Philadelphia University. She chooses five of her best students to intern for her. Wes, Connor, Michaela, Asher and Laurel soon discover they are involved in a murder conspiracy. Two related murders personally connected with Keating are presented through flashbacks and flash-forwards.

programme.title: Boxing
programme.desc: Get ready for explosive action and jaw-dropping knockouts as Top Rank Boxing brings you a series of exhilarating bouts in the ring. From heavyweight showdowns to thrilling lightweight clashes, experience the power, skill, and determination of the worlds best fighters as they vie for the ultimate prize. Strap in and prepare for heart-pounding excitement as Top Rank Boxing presents a lineup of must-see fights that will leave you on the edge of your seat. Dont miss a moment of the hard-hitting action!

programme.title: Turkish Airlines EuroLeague
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: LaLiga
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Turkish Airlines EuroLeague
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: UFC
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Kinnisvaratehingud
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Vaike maja, suur majapidamine
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: Unspouse My House
programme.desc: Forgetting your ex isnt so easy when your whole house reminds you of them. Everywhere you turn, theres that horrible wall paper they insisted on getting, pictures of your holidays together, they even painted your front door their favourite colour. Thats where designer Orlando Soria comes in. Orlando considers himself somewhat a break-up expert, and hes determined to give these newly single clients houses the new lease of life that they so desperately need, allowing them to move on from their ex.

programme.title: Selling The Hamptons
programme.desc: In the high-stakes world of Hamptons real estate, the art of buying, selling, hustling, and schmoozing is all part of the game. But this is the Hamptons like weve never seen before. As life is slowly getting back to normal for most people around the world, life in the Hamptons is the busiest its ever been! And the Nest Seekers Team is in overdrive trying to adapt to a market that hasnt seen this type of demand... ever! As the weather heats up, so does the competition for these young brokers who want to prove that they can find success in the most exclusive real estate market in the country.

programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Vaike maja, suur majapidamine
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: Selling the Big Easy
programme.sub-title: The Algiers Revival vs. the Central City Stunner
programme.desc: Real estate professional Brittany Picolo-Ramos and her team make house hunting fun as they take an enthusiastic approach to buying and selling elegant and historic properties in New Orleans.

programme.title: Selling the Big Easy

programme.desc: Real estate professional Brittany Picolo-Ramos and her team make house hunting fun as they take an enthusiastic approach to buying and selling elegant and historic properties in New Orleans.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: Chip and Jo survey the castles damaged interior. They learn about its rich history as they get started on the ambitious restoration.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: Jo develops her vision for the castle, and commissions custom artisan pieces. Chip learns what can be salvaged and restored, and what will be built new.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Divided By Design
programme.desc: Eilyn and Ray must finish their forever home before their housewarming party, and after three years, Eilyn reveals her luxury reno in the Keys.

programme.title: Whats Wrong with That House?
programme.desc: Joe Mazza and designer Noel Gatts address the safety concerns of expectant parents 100-year-old ancestral home before the baby arrives.

programme.title: Christina In the Country
programme.sub-title: Lil Bit Country, Lil Bit Rock
programme.desc: Christina takes on a rock-star couple and looks to deliver a sexy bedroom and make their backyard party cabana dreams come true.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: The Flipping El Moussas
programme.desc: Tarek and Heather update a cute cottage in Cheviot Hills, California. But theres another flipper a few doors down that could create some fierce competition!

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: Follow married couple Dave and Jenny Marrs as they undertake a challenging renovation project, transforming a 19th century historic home into a bed and breakfast. As soon as they saw the property in Bentonville, Arkansas the idea was born. The financial stakes are high, as the place has been abandoned for a long time, but Dave and Jenny are determined to turn it into an inn of their dreams. Join as we follow their journey every step of the way in detail, as they face various issues, from construction to bee infestation and a lot more.

programme.title: Elu saarel
programme.desc: A couple are ready to leave Seattle and escape to Bainbridge Island. He wants a turnkey house close to the ferry, while she hopes for a big garden.

programme.title: Elu saarel
programme.desc: A family from Eastern Washington are moving to their favourite camping spot, Fidalgo Island. They need a house with lots of space for the kids to play.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Rannamajade otsinguil
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas video kummalisest varelevatest tuledest koosnevast moodustisest on viimane tõend, et Houston on UFOde lemmikpaik? Kes on see kaameraga jaadvustatud salaparane humanoidne olend? Kas valitsus tabati sõjavaebaasis tulnukate tehnikat transportimast?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Ameerika piirialad on tais legende kauboidest, indiaanlastest ja lindpriidest. Ent on ka palju õudseid lugusid neetud magedest, koletistest ja isegi UFOdest. Kas need jutud võivad olla tõsi? Kas Metsik Laas on palju veidram, kui tavaliselt arvatakse?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Taas Montebellos, tuleb Gunter "appi" Renele, kes ei anna talle selleks aega. Darrell uritab Kimberit oma kuningannaks teha, samal ajal kui Ivy ja ta poisid teevad Rochambeau moel teed uhke pakkumiseni.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Kenny suundub magedesse, olles kogu aeg valvel puumade suhtes. Lisa teenib kasumit vaikese õe laoboksiga, kuid nadala ostja nominatsiooni saab Brandi.

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Kui meeskonnaliikmed kogevad pettumust valmistavat tagasilooki, on nad hammastunud, kui saavad teada, et see võis viia labimurdelise avastuseni.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy viib oma lapsed Victorvillei "rannapaevale" ja nad võtavad sellest maksimumi. Brandi uritab kustutada halbu telkimismalestusi hea laoboksi abil. Hoolimata sellest, et Rene hurjutab teda ta valikute tõttu, õnnestub Kennyl saada korralik tulu.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Laura viibib omaette Moreno Valleys ja ta pole selle põhjuste osas eriti salatsev. Brandi teenib kena kasumi. Rene nukukapist leiab paar ullatust, samas kui Ivy tegeleb pisut uleloomulike asjadega.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy ja Pops ostavad Fullertonis kotte, kuid lõpetavad konteineritega. Darrell ja Kimber panevad kõik mangu mangukapi eest, samas kui Brandi katab oma kulud muidu tagasihoidliku majapidamisboksiga.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Rosamondis on naisi rohkem kui mehi, sest Dusty ja ta sõbranna avastavad vanu telereliikviaid. Danielle ja Lisa aitavad Brandil kulda kaevata ja see, mida nad leiavad, sunnib pausile. Kenny komistab millelgi, mis naib olevat eksootiline meloodiakarp.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Lancaster on Ivy meepott, nii et kõigil on parem olla ettevaatlik, sest muidu võivad nad nõelata saada. Lisa plaanib boksi valimisel kasutada oma paremat ajupoolkera... või hoopis vasakut? Samal ajal, kui Dusty ja Tolliputka Lupe korraldavad mitzvah.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Uuringud on naidanud, et kuni 70% kõigist UFO-de nagemisest toimub nn "lemmikpaikades", kus on regulaarselt teateid nagemuste, salaparaste tulede ja ebatavaliste nahtuste kohta - ja seda mitte ainult tanapaeval, vaid juba tuhandeid aastaid tagasi.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Mis on see salaparane objekt, mida lennukipiloodid on filminud 10 km kõrgusel Pakistani kohal lennates? Kas Jaapani uurimislaev jaadvustas kaadrid legendaarsest vaala meenutavast humanoid-veeolendist, keda tuntakse Ningeni nime all?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kui Rick võtab sihikule 19. sajandist parit vintpussi, siis kas ta tabab tehinguga marki või laseb mooda? Muuja uritab painutada hinda Arnold Schwarzeneggeri autogrammiga autobiograafiaga. Kas Rick toob kulla koju või lõpetatakse tema pakkumine?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ostjad suunduvad Palm Springsi, et otsida kallimaid kaupu. Kenny uritab suurendada kasumit muidu vaheutleva boksi puhul. Rene naeb kiiret potentsiaali seal, kus teised seda ei nae, ja paneb oma taskuraha mangu.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Oceansideis paike paistab, tuues valja kõik paikesevarjud. Dusty ja Lupe roovivad uhe lihtsa boksi ja see tasub end ara. Darrell maksustab end ja see paneb ta peaaegu laoruumi vangi. Brandi ja Lisa saavad lõpuks oma investeeringu tagasi.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Ameerika piirialad on tais legende kauboidest, indiaanlastest ja lindpriidest. Ent on ka palju õudseid lugusid neetud magedest, koletistest ja isegi UFOdest. Kas need jutud võivad olla tõsi? Kas Metsik Laas on palju veidram, kui tavaliselt arvatakse?

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Molly ja Russel pannakse arcade-bowling-mangu muuja poolt oma saatmisnõuetega paika, samal ajal kui Tamara filmikujude vedu Minnesota suurimasse kommipoodi kuumeneb leegitseva kõrvallaadungi tõttu ule.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Dwight ja Tyesha komistavad animatroonilise turannosauruse otsa ja hakkavad seda tukeldama, samal ajal kui Doug haukab liialt suure suutaie, kui ta liigutab hiiglaslikku tagahoovis asuvat piraadilaeva stiilis mangumaja.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Natashale teeb nalja klassikaliste põrkeautode vedu, kuid kas see atraktsioon jaab ta laeval terveks? Vahepeal laheb Tamara minigolfi vedu vett vedama, kui 12-osaline alglast muutub 100-osaliseks koormaks.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Brandi krahmab West Covinas endale korraliku maatuki ja see tasub end kenasti ara. Rene ei suuda vastu panna hea seifi saladusele. Kenny ei suuda oma nalga rahuldada, samal ajal kui Barry kasutab võimalust, et konkurentide tagant napata.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Arst on... Riversideis. Rene võtab suurelt ette. Ivy leiab asjadest pungil laoboksi ja komistab ebatavalise paritoluga antiikesemete peale. Darrell haarab vaiksema boksi, kuid avastab, et head asjad on mõnikord tõepoolest vaikestes pakendites.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Rene ilmub West Covinasse, tundes end vaga nostalgiliselt ja tõstab lõpuks oma tuju. Kenny võtab sihikule "kolmerattalise" boksi ja tegeleb sellega, mis seal sees on.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Jarrod ja Brandi saavad omale vaikese tooriistakomplekti. Barry jaab oksjonile hiljaks ja loob kampa uhe tagasihoidliku panustajaga. Mark Balelo lahkub oksjonilt suure printeriga, aga kas see toob talle ka suurt tulu?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Barryle kukub Orangeis Californias kapp selga. Ivy Calvin sobrab prugis ja leiab nii mõndagi. Jarrod ja Brandi võidavad uhe lao, kuid kas nad ka teenivad selle pealt?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Tanapaeva maailmas usume, et tehnoloogia kaitseb meid katastroofide eest. Kuid kas me oleme tõesti kaitstud? Või oleme tanapaeval sama haavatavad, kui olid meie esivanemad tulekahjude, maavarinate ja orkaanide suhtes?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Kui nahtavale ilmub varajane peos hoitav videomangususteem, kas Corey saab enne mangu lõppu diili teha? Lisaks toob muuja Rickile tamburiini, mida kunagi mangis Prince. Kas labiraakimised panevad Ricki pidutsema nagu 1999. aastal?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Kui meeskonnaliikmed kogevad pettumust valmistavat tagasilooki, on nad hammastunud, kui saavad teada, et see võis viia labimurdelise avastuseni.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Muistsed sumerid rajasid tsivilisatsiooni, mida peetakse maailma esimeseks, ja nad panid oma erakordsed saavutused oma jumalate, Anunnakide arvele. Kuid kas on võimalik, et need olendid olid maavalised kulalised Maal?

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas foto UFO-st, mis hõljub Hollomani lennuvaebaasi kohal New Mexicos, on kinnitus, et president Eisenhoweril oli seal ulisalajane kohtumine tulnukatega? Kust lahtub Briti Columbias Witsetis salvestatud hirmuaratav ulgumine?

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Molly ja Russell avastavad, et filmide maagia on vaid illusioon, kui nad uritavad vedada filmi esilinastuseks ikoonilist filmiautot, samal ajal kui Doug saab teada, et veepargi aeglane jõgi peaks kandma pisut teistsugust nime.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Hiiglaslik kirikutorn paneb Natashat kahtlema oma usus kahveltõstukisse, samal ajal kui Dwighti ja Tyesha jaoks saabub talv koos kuningliku veoga, mis koosneb kasitsi valmistatud troonist ja hiiglaslikust kuningakoogist.

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Vanaaegsete suusagondlite laadung viib Molly ja Russelli Vermonti magedest Colorado Kaljumaestikku, samal ajal kui Dougile antakse ulesanne toimetada ainulaadne majake uhte ikoonilisse Jellystonei parki.

programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick ja Chum naitavad valget naeratust, kui muuja toob paari turannosauruse hambaid. Kas nad loovad tehingule hambad sisse või sureb see valja? Siis laheb Corey võitlema signeeritud Mark Buerhlei trikoo eest. Kas ta suudab sõlmida taiusliku tehingu?

programme.title: Oak Islandi needus
programme.desc: Samal ajal, kui meeskond puuab peatada vee voolamist aiašahti, suvenevad Oak Islandi, kapten Phippsi ja templiruutlite vahelised seosed 5. platsil kiiresti.

programme.title: Kuidas seda selgitada?
programme.desc: Kas video kummalisest varelevatest tuledest koosnevast moodustisest on viimane tõend, et Houston on UFOde lemmikpaik? Kes on see kaameraga jaadvustatud salaparane humanoidne olend? Kas valitsus tabati sõjavaebaasis tulnukate tehnikat transportimast?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Sari "Iidsed tulnukad" uurib kõige usaldusvaarsemaid tõendeid tulnukate kohta, mis Maale 75 miljoni aasta valtel jaanud on - dinosauruste ajastust iidse Egiptuseni ja tanapaeva USA laaneosa kõrbetaevani.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy roovib Popsi ja viib ta Rosamondi, kus nad hangivad osavalt suureparase laoboksi. Kenny asub kõiki lõbustama ja tema naljatamine lõpeb tahtede nagemisega. Lisa tõestab, et tal on sõber... esialgu.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.sub-title: Kui sul on see olemas, anna minna
programme.desc: Kenny satub tuttavale sõidukile ja jargneb sellele kuni Lancasteri oksjonini, kus ta puuab meeleheitlikult leida bensiiniraha. Rene uritab leida uut õnne parast kaotust Vegases.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Rohkem kui 50 riigis on dokumenteeritud ule 10 000 viljaringi moodustise, millest paljudel on omadusi, mis ei allu tavaparastele seletustele. Kas need on maavalise paritoluga? Ja kui jah, siis mis on nende eesmark?

programme.title: Tules karastunud
programme.desc: Viimases "Võida kohtunikke" võistluses on vastamisi kaks endist saate tšempionit 5-tunnises voorus, valmistades pichangatti noa. Tšempionil on vaid 8 tundi aega hirmuaratava shamshiri mõõga valmistamiseks. Kas sellest piisab, et kohtunikku võita?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Šotimaa on aastaid olnud uleloomulike nahtuste epitsenter. See on koduks iidsetele kiviringidele, lugudele kummalistest olenditest ja kuulus paik, kus margatakse palju UFO-sid. Kas võib olla, et Šotimaa on maavaliste kulaliste magnet?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Aastaid on eri kultuurides ule maailma levinud uskumus tahevaravate kohta, mille kaudu on Maale saabunud olendid universumi kaugetest punktidest ja isegi teistest dimensioonidest. Kas sellised varavad võivad tõesti eksisteerida?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Tanapaeva maailmas usume, et tehnoloogia kaitseb meid katastroofide eest. Kuid kas me oleme tõesti kaitstud? Või oleme tanapaeval sama haavatavad, kui olid meie esivanemad tulekahjude, maavarinate ja orkaanide suhtes?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy roovib Popsi ja viib ta Rosamondi, kus nad hangivad osavalt suureparase laoboksi. Kenny asub kõiki lõbustama ja tema naljatamine lõpeb tahtede nagemisega. Lisa tõestab, et tal on sõber... esialgu.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Rene ilmub West Covinasse, tundes end vaga nostalgiliselt ja tõstab lõpuks oma tuju. Kenny võtab sihikule "kolmerattalise" boksi ja tegeleb sellega, mis seal sees on.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Jarrod ja Brandi saavad omale vaikese tooriistakomplekti. Barry jaab oksjonile hiljaks ja loob kampa uhe tagasihoidliku panustajaga. Mark Balelo lahkub oksjonilt suure printeriga, aga kas see toob talle ka suurt tulu?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Barryle kukub Orangeis Californias kapp selga. Ivy Calvin sobrab prugis ja leiab nii mõndagi. Jarrod ja Brandi võidavad uhe lao, kuid kas nad ka teenivad selle pealt?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ostjad suunduvad Palm Springsi, et otsida kallimaid kaupu. Kenny uritab suurendada kasumit muidu vaheutleva boksi puhul. Rene naeb kiiret potentsiaali seal, kus teised seda ei nae, ja paneb oma taskuraha mangu.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Oceansideis paike paistab, tuues valja kõik paikesevarjud. Dusty ja Lupe roovivad uhe lihtsa boksi ja see tasub end ara. Darrell maksustab end ja see paneb ta peaaegu laoruumi vangi. Brandi ja Lisa saavad lõpuks oma investeeringu tagasi.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Ton ja Allen suunduvad Hollywoodi oksjonile ja kohtuvad uue konkurendiga, kellel on nailiselt lõputu rahavoog. Parast seda, kui nad avastavad kolme toruga pussi ja antiikse kaamelisadula, seisab Allen silmitsi vana lapsepõlvehirmuga.

programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: New Orleansi reisil puuavad Ton ja Allen segada ari ja lõbu. Nad sõdivad kohalike elanikega karmil oksjonil, võidavad Mardi Gras konteineri, mis sisaldab konfetipuhurit ja moodsat kallioopet, ning lahevad siis linna peale.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Tanapaeva maailmas usume, et tehnoloogia kaitseb meid katastroofide eest. Kuid kas me oleme tõesti kaitstud? Või oleme tanapaeval sama haavatavad, kui olid meie esivanemad tulekahjude, maavarinate ja orkaanide suhtes?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick ja Chum naitavad valget naeratust, kui muuja toob paari turannosauruse hambaid. Kas nad loovad tehingule hambad sisse või sureb see valja? Siis laheb Corey võitlema signeeritud Mark Buerhlei trikoo eest. Kas ta suudab sõlmida taiusliku tehingu?

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Natashale teeb nalja klassikaliste põrkeautode vedu, kuid kas see atraktsioon jaab ta laeval terveks? Vahepeal laheb Tamara minigolfi vedu vett vedama, kui 12-osaline alglast muutub 100-osaliseks koormaks.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Darrell Sheets sunnib Mark Balelot minema paljudesse varakambritesse, mille sisu viib plahvatusliku olukorrani. Barry Weiss leiab antiikesemeid, aga kas ta teenib nende pealt?

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ivy Calvin teenib kasumit. Darrell Sheets võtab ohjad ilma Brandonita enda katte. Jarrod ja Brandi on oksjoni tõelised võitjad.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Ostjad kohtuvad uute oksjonipidajatega. Darrell kaitseb oma ala. Ivy Calvin leiab tooriista, mida ta pole varem nainud. Jarrod ja Brandi peavad leidma asjad oma uude kauplusesse.

programme.title: Lahingud ladude parast
programme.desc: Jarrod ja Brandi leiavad manguasju ning Jarrod uritab maailmameistriga võistelda. Harrise vennad otsivad Hollywoodi kuulsuste alleel uht staari. Barry panustab turvaliselt.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Moodsad prohvetid. Katastroofilised eelaimused. Unenaod tulevastest roimadest. Kas inimesed suudavad tõesti tulevikku ette naha? Ja kas me suudame sellisel juhul selle teadmise abil valtida ees ootavaid surmavaid juhtumeid?

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Rohkem kui 50 riigis on dokumenteeritud ule 10 000 viljaringi moodustise, millest paljudel on omadusi, mis ei allu tavaparastele seletustele. Kas need on maavalise paritoluga? Ja kui jah, siis mis on nende eesmark?

programme.title: Muistsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Iidsete astronautide teooria usku Giorgio Tsoukalos jagab mõtteid hiiglaslike kivimoodustiste ja kummaliste hiidkujude kohta, mida tuntakse monoliitidena. Mis sundis iidseid inimesi ule maailma hiiglaslikke kive liigutama ja kivimonumente ehitama?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Muistsed sumerid rajasid tsivilisatsiooni, mida peetakse maailma esimeseks, ja nad panid oma erakordsed saavutused oma jumalate, Anunnakide arvele. Kuid kas on võimalik, et need olendid olid maavalised kulalised Maal?

programme.title: Kullerilahingud
programme.desc: Hiiglaslik kirikutorn paneb Natashat kahtlema oma usus kahveltõstukisse, samal ajal kui Dwighti ja Tyesha jaoks saabub talv koos kuningliku veoga, mis koosneb kasitsi valmistatud troonist ja hiiglaslikust kuningakoogist.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Inimkond on saatnud satelliite kosmosesse ja allveelaevu ookeani põhja, kuid Maa pinna all olev ala on endiselt salaparane. Kas kivikihtide alla või tohututesse koobastesse on maetud sugavad saladused?

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Skinwalkeri rantšos algab uurimine, kus meeskonnaliikmed seisavad silmitsi saladusega, mida dr Travis Taylor on pidanud viimased kaks aastat nende eest varjama, enne kui nad viivad labi õhukatsetuse, mis paljastab šokeerivaid ja hairivaid nahtusi.

programme.title: Pandikunnid
programme.desc: Rick Harrison koos oma perega on Las Vegases asuva pandimaja omanikud. Sari "Pandikunnid" jalgib mida põnevat pandimajja tuuakse ning mida muuakse. Kaib pidev tingimine hindade ule ning aeg-ajalt satub pandimajja ka vaga vaartuslikke esemeid.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: On kohatud lugematul hulgal kummalisi olendeid. Pealtnagijate kirjelduste põhjal saab neid kirjeldada ainult kui koletisi, mida ei saa teadusega seletada. Kas on võimalik, et varjus varitsevad meid hirmuaratavad koletised?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Egiptuse liiva all asub 24 tohutut sarkofaagi, mis kõik on tuhjad. Mis eesmarki võisid need hiiglaslikud hauakambrid taita? Ja kas on võimalik, et need taiuslikult nikerdatud kastid ei ole mitte inimeste, vaid maavaliste kulaliste poolt kujundatud?

programme.title: Tulnukate rantšo
programme.desc: Kui enamik inimesi otsib maavalist elu taevast, siis uks grupp uurijaid kaitub vastupidiselt - nad otsivad seda maa alt. Skinwalkeri rantšo Utah osariigis on kuulus paigana, kus on taheldatud sadu paranormaalseid ja UFO-dega seotud nahtusi.

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Loomariik on tais surmavaid kiskjaid ja mõned neist rundavad erakordsetel ja seletamatutel viisidel. Kuid kas mõned loomad rundavad inimesi ka muudel põhjustel kui tavaline kaitse ja nalg?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Aastaid on eri kultuurides ule maailma levinud uskumus tahevaravate kohta, mille kaudu on Maale saabunud olendid universumi kaugetest punktidest ja isegi teistest dimensioonidest. Kas sellised varavad võivad tõesti eksisteerida?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Kas me oleme tõesti universumis uksi? Iidsete astronautide teoreetikud pakuvad valja, et kirjeldused taevastest jumalatest ja taheolenditest võivad kajastada tegelikke kohtumisi maavaliste kulalistega kauges minevikus. Kas see võib olla tõsi?

programme.title: William Shatneriga seletamatutes paikades
programme.desc: Maailm on tais hammastavaid loodusnahtusi, mis on nii suurejoonelised ja kohati nii kummalised, et need ei vasta tavaparasele tarkusele. Kas teadus suudab selgitada Maa musteeriume? Või on inimese teadmised Maast vaid pinnapealsed?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Egiptuse liiva all asub 24 tohutut sarkofaagi, mis kõik on tuhjad. Mis eesmarki võisid need hiiglaslikud hauakambrid taita? Ja kas on võimalik, et need taiuslikult nikerdatud kastid ei ole mitte inimeste, vaid maavaliste kulaliste poolt kujundatud?

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: Aastaid on eri kultuurides ule maailma levinud uskumus tahevaravate kohta, mille kaudu on Maale saabunud olendid universumi kaugetest punktidest ja isegi teistest dimensioonidest. Kas sellised varavad võivad tõesti eksisteerida?

programme.title: Ajaloo ruustamine
programme.desc: Michael Steinhardt, suurim antiikesemete erakoguja, on sunnitud loovutama 70 miljoni dollari vaartuses varastatud saaki ja tal keelatakse kogumine. Steinhardti allakaik saabub parast nelja-aastast uurimist, mida tuntakse operatsioonina "Demetra".

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: Documentary series. Evolve takes an in-depth look at the evolution of some of the planets most iconic animals. Using computer generated imagery and experimental science, the team take you on a journey through history to look at how these species evolved to fit their habitats and surroundings. The show explores the diverse and unique anatomy changes our planets historic species have gone through. Whether its the deadly teeth of Tyrannosaurus Rex, the telescopic eyesight of lightning-fast birds, or the night vision big cats use to hunt, Evolve reveals some of natures most interesting secrets. Nominated in 2009s News and Documentary Emmy Award for Outstanding Science And Technology Programming.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Allilma linnad
programme.desc: In major cities around the world today, skyscrapers loom overhead, taxis honk their horns and street vendors peddle their wares. But below lies city upon city - each with its fascinating and unknown history. This series will explore these layers, which are often hundreds of feet deep, and examine a citys ancient cisterns, dank dungeons, eerie tombs, clandestine hideouts, and even underground shipwrecks that have been lost for hundreds and hundreds of years. What are the underground layers of the most populated cities on earth? And how did (and do) engineers build layer upon layer up to todays city streets? This series will reveal the technological marvels that allowed the construction of one city upon another - literally.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Some of Americas most important historical and cultural treasures have been lost or stolen from famous museums, government archives and private collections. Host Brad Meltzer sets out to find a number of these precious artifacts, such as George Washingtons teeth, Apollo 11 moon landing tapes, ground zero flag from the September 11 attacks, Hitlers personal photo albums, and more. Brad is also soliciting tips from the audience, and offering a money reward.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Zahi journeys in to the Five Chambers with the fellows in tow. Together they will document the ancient graffiti on the walls of the Chambers, proving Zahis theory that ancient Egyptians, not slaves, built the Pyramids at Giza.

programme.title: Ajaloo ruustamine
programme.desc: Michael Steinhardt, suurim antiikesemete erakoguja, on sunnitud loovutama 70 miljoni dollari vaartuses varastatud saaki ja tal keelatakse kogumine. Steinhardti allakaik saabub parast nelja-aastast uurimist, mida tuntakse operatsioonina "Demetra".

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Some of Americas most important historical and cultural treasures have been lost or stolen from famous museums, government archives and private collections. Host Brad Meltzer sets out to find a number of these precious artifacts, such as George Washingtons teeth, Apollo 11 moon landing tapes, ground zero flag from the September 11 attacks, Hitlers personal photo albums, and more. Brad is also soliciting tips from the audience, and offering a money reward.

programme.title: Breaking Mysterious
programme.desc: Radio host Jimmy Church (Fade to Black, Coast to Coast AM) and a dedicated group of truth-seekers are hitting the road and investigating the biggest mysteries, controversies, and conspiracies of our strange world including: A possible covert undersea UFO base hidden off the California Coast. Is it possible that a popular virtual smartphone game might actually be part of a CIA operation? Did the U.S. government create an army of mind-controlled assassins? Plus a look into a possible plot to assassinate President John Kennedy just weeks before the tragic events in Dallas. A search for lost Confederate gold. A new Bigfoot hotspot where you least expect it. A new theory on time travel and missing nuclear weapons right here in America. We seek disclosure, answers and the truth. We seek to understand The Unexplained.

programme.title: Battles BC
programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. Recreated with stunning technology, we reveal these violent conflicts like never before, examining the soldiers, strategies and weapons deployed by the powerful legions. From Hannibals clashes with Rome to Alexander the Greats pursuits throughout India, these conflicts have had a resounding impact on our history and with these reconstructions you will see the ferocious aspects of war in antiquity.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Countdown to Apocalypse
programme.desc: According to the Book of Revelation, the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse will usher in four divine judgments that promise to devastate humanity. Some believe its dark imagery is coming to fruition in modern times.

programme.title: Secret History of Humans
programme.desc: Using dramatic reconstructions, this fascinating documentary series explores the evolution and advancement of the human race, dissecting the key events and changes that have affected and altered various civilisations. Each episode in this 12-part series focusses on a unique transformation of our ancestors, as they discovered more and more about the planet they inhabit. With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Secret History of Humans

With expert historians offering explanations to these changes, the series reveals how powerful forces of nature compelled humans to adapt, the birth of war, the discovery of fire and metals, and the building of giant structures, among many others.

programme.title: Muistse aja top 10
programme.desc: Egiptuses on tehtud ajaloo suurimaid arheoloogilisi leide, alates Sfinksi mõistatustest ja muumiatest kuni puramiidideni. Kuid millisel saladusel on olnud kõige suurem mõju meie nagemusele muistsest Egiptusest?

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Teise maailmasõja kadunud kuld
programme.desc: Kui meeskond laheneb tunnelile, mis võib olla aardelaburindi osa, saab Bingo teada, et osa diktaator Ferdinand Marcose varandusest võidi Yamashita aarde seast varastada. Ta paljastab võimaliku seose CIA vandenõuga.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Join our hosts, Mikey Kay and Garth Baldwin, as they investigate whether the famed and mysterious Knights Templar were really disbanded and destroyed in 1307 or if they survived, taking the Holy Grail with them. The historical detectives journey through the middle-east in an attempt to uncover new evidence of the true fate of this secretive organization. Starting off in the holy city of Jerusalem, the team explore archaic tunnels and a safe house that could have been used to smuggle religious relics to safety. Their exploratory travels then take them to the ancient city of Acre and on to Cypress to search for clues about a covert Templar mission. Secret Templar codes lead the unit to a monastery in Spain which might be able to prove that the knights survived the fateful arrests of Friday the 13th, 1307.

programme.desc: Step back in time and revisit some of the most brutal battles that took place before Christ. programme.title: The Killers - Live at Rock Am Ring
programme.desc: Rock Am Ring (Nurburgring), Rock Im Park (Nuremberg) is a music festival that takes place annually at the Nurburgring Race Track in western Germany. Featuring The Killers.

programme.title: Pharrell Williams - Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Pharrell Williams performs his hits including "Marilyn Monroe", "Come Get It Bae", "Happy" and many more.

programme.title: Mary J. Blige _ Live in London
programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007.

programme.title: iConcerts Hits
programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Justin Bieber - Live at Madison Square Garden
programme.desc: The film follows the pop star Justin Bieber during 10 days counting down to his performance at Madison Square Garden. It also includes footage from his My World Tour, interviews with family and friends, a visit to his original hometown in Canada, and some of the story and videos of his childhood.

programme.title: The Killers - Live at Rock Am Ring
programme.desc: Rock Am Ring (Nurburgring), Rock Im Park (Nuremberg) is a music festival that takes place annually at the Nurburgring Race Track in western Germany. Featuring The Killers.

programme.title: Justin Timberlake FutureSex/LoveShow
programme.desc: The FutureSex/LoveSounds album, which spawned the tour FutureSex/LoveShow, is one of the most awarded 2007 albums and has sold more than eight million copies worldwide. "Sexyback", "What Comes Around ... Goes Around", "My Love", "Summer Love" and "Lovestoned" are some of the highlights and were among the most played of the year around the world.

programme.title: LL Cool J _ Countdown Concert
programme.desc: James Todd Smith III, best known by the stage name of LL Cool J, is an American hip-hop artist and actor. He is best known for his romantic ballads

programme.title: Jessie J _ Live in London
programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007.

programme.title: Fall Out Boy _ Boys of Zummer
programme.sub-title: Fall Out Boy _ Boys of Zummer: Live In Chicago
programme.desc: Join Multi-platinum selling artist Fall Out Boy as they travel back to their hometown of Chicago for a mind-blowing audio and visual extravaganza that will change your concept of what a rock concert should be! Featuring their newest hits Centuries, Irresistible and Uma Thurman, this 70 minute, 17 song concert also includes American Beauty/American Psycho; Sugar, Were Goin Down; Dance, Dance; This Aint a Scene, Its an Arms Race; Thnks fr th Mmrs and My Songs Know What You Did in the Dark (Light Em Up). This special performance will go down in history as one of the most memorable concerts from Fall Out Boys career, filmed during the Boys of Zummer tour that spanned over 39 cities throughout 2015. With stunning video walls containing dynamic visual content, great musicianship, and powerful songs all make for an unforgettable concert experience!

programme.title: The day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: Amy Winehouse was an English singer and songwriter whose stunning voice easily following in the footsteps of Janis Joplin and Billie Holiday. Her debut album, Frank (was a critical success in the UK and was nominated for the Mercury Prize. Her follow-up album, Back to Black (2006), led to five 50th Annual Grammy Awards, and a record of most Grammys won by a female artist in one night. In short, a music legend who died at the young age of 27, from alcohol intoxication on 23 July 2011. Her album Back to Black posthumously became one the UKs best-selling albums of the 21st century.

programme.title: Justin Bieber - Live at Madison Square Garden
programme.desc: The film follows the pop star Justin Bieber during 10 days counting down to his performance at Madison Square Garden. It also includes footage from his My World Tour, interviews with family and friends, a visit to his original hometown in Canada, and some of the story and videos of his childhood.

programme.title: The Killers - Live at Rock Am Ring
programme.desc: Rock Am Ring (Nurburgring), Rock Im Park (Nuremberg) is a music festival that takes place annually at the Nurburgring Race Track in western Germany. Featuring The Killers.

programme.title: Ellie Goulding - Live at the iTunes Festival
programme.desc: Do not just be fascinated by the beauty and girlishness of this bright-eyed Englishwoman. Ellie Goulding has a lot more to offer fans of good pop music and its electronic variations. Since releasing her first album in 2010, Ellie has traveled the world to showcase her talents, both in the voice and in the composition of her songs. These talents can be seen in this show at the iTunes Festival in London, with special mention for the songs "Burn", "Halcyon", "Lights" and "My Blood".

programme.title: Charli XCX - Reading and Leeds Festival
programme.desc: The Reading and Leeds Festivals are a pair of music festivals that take place annually in the cities of Reading and Leeds in England. Featuring Charli XCX.

programme.title: Maroon 5 _ Live in London
programme.desc: Filmed at Roundhouse, London, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Maroon 5 featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Moves Like Jagger, Daylight, "This Love" and many more…

programme.title: Slipknot - Day of the Gusano
programme.desc: After more than a decade of patiently waiting, the Mexican Maggots finally welcome the most anticipated visit of Slipknot and Knotfest to Mexico. On December 8th, 2015, Knotfest took over Mexico City for the experience of a lifetime. The most passionate, powerful, dedicated and loud Maggots on Earth attended in hordes to witness in action their most inspirational figures: the 9 members of Slipknot. The band did not disappoint. This show will leave you speechless and craving more. The intensity of Slipknot and the love they have for their fans is palpable. The wait was well worth it.

programme.title: Green Day - Live at Fox Theater
programme.desc: Live concert of legendary punk-rock band Green Day on April 14, 2009, performing the whole of their imminent new album, "21st Century Breakdown", at the Fox Theater in the bands hometown, Oakland, California.

programme.desc: A selection of our best concert previews and exclusive interviews.

programme.title: Prince - The Unauthorized Biography
programme.desc: Documentary focusing on the legendary musicians life and work, from his troubled childhood in Minneapolis to becoming one of the most popular and innovative artists in contemporary music.

programme.title: Rodrigo y Gabriela - Garorock Festival
programme.desc: The mexican duet takes the stage at Garorock Festival, in July 2014.

programme.title: Coldplay _ Phenomenon
programme.desc: In the space of just three amazing albums Coldplay have transformed from unknowns to international superstars. Drawing on archive film and interviews with the band, a team of leading music critics and musicians reveal the secrets behind the Coldplay phenomenon. The result is the most hard hitting frank and penetrating review of the music and personalities which shaped the Coldplay phenomenon ever produced. Featuring highlights from: Speed of Sound, Politik, The Scientist, Yellow, Clocks, Trouble, Fix You, In My Place and more...

programme.title: Ziggy Marley - Live at the Filmore
programme.desc: The Fillmore Auditorium is a historic concert hall in San Francisco, California. Founded by Bill Graham, it was named after being located originally on the corners of Fillmore Street and Geary Boulevard.

programme.title: Bibi Bourelly - Live at Eurockeennes
programme.desc: Watch Bibi Bourellys live performance at Eurockeennes in 2016.

programme.title: Lana Del Rey _ Live in London
programme.desc: Born to Die is the second album by singer-songwriter Lana Del Rey, and the first to be officially released on January 27, 2012 and that would lead to global success; In countries such as the United Kingdom the album was the best selling of that year, that recognition made her a guest of honor in one of the most popular London festivals iTunes Festival, where she would open the awe of all attendees on the night of September 25 2012 at the Roundhouse in the city of London.

programme.title: Led Zeppelin - Physical Graffiti
programme.sub-title: Led Zeppelin - Physical Graffiti: A Classic Album Under Review
programme.desc: This is a documentary film about the build-up, making, release, and - crucially - music contained on this most revered of albums. With the aid of rare and classic performances, scarce interviews, seldom seen photographs and contributions from those involved in the making of the record - plus the review and critique from a panel of Zeppelin experts - this program finally lifts the lid on what many believe to be Led Zeps very finest offering. With contributions from; the albums engineer, Ron Nevison; former Yardbird, Chris Dreja; Swansong recording artist, Maggie Bell; author of The Rough Guide to Led Zeppelin, Nigel Williamson; Tight But Loose editor, Dave Lewis; Classic Rock Magazines Malcolm Dome; renowned guitar tutor and author, Rikky Rooksby and Robert Plant biographer, Neil Daniels. This is the complete story behind what what Rolling Stone called "their Tommy, Beggars Banquet and Sgt. Pepper rolled into one".

programme.title: Milky Chance - Garorock Festival
programme.desc: The German duet is back and better than ever! Milky Chance is the success story of two school friends, Clemens Rehbein and Philipp Dausch. After a long break, 2017 marks the release of a second, long-waited, album ""Blossom"". And, for the public, finally the occasion to discover live these new compositions, mixing rock, folk and electro pop. With reggae vibrations that can rub shoulders with house elements, Milky Chance has one of the most singular sounds. With the presence of musicians on stage, and if we believe the listening of the new record, we can expect more electric concerts, more electronic and even more energetic than in the past!

programme.title: Iggy Pop - Austin City Limits
programme.desc: The Austin City Limits Music Festival is an annual music festival that takes place at Zilker Park in Austin, Texas. The festival features more than 130 bands on eight stages for three days.

programme.title: The Doobie Brothers - Live At Wolf Trap
programme.desc: Filmed in high definition on 25 July 2004 at Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts in Virginia, "Live At Wolf Trap" captures The Doobie Brothers in fine form on a set that mixes classic hits with some rarely performed tracks from across their extensive catalogue. This would prove to be the last recorded footage of long time drummer Keith Knudsen performing with the Doobie Brothers prior to his sad death from cancer in February 2005.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Natalia Grace
programme.desc: Now re-aged as an adult and living alone, Natalia wreaks havoc by stalking her new neighbours. Plus, the Barnetts dark side emerges as they face investigation.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Natalia Grace
programme.desc: The Barnetts, now divorced, abandon Natalia in an apartment in Indiana. When the police get involved, Michaels shocking confessions lead to their arrests.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.sub-title: He Said There Were More Of Them
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Truth About Murder With Sunny Hostin
programme.desc: Host, and former federal prosecutor, Sunny Hostin (from The View) takes us on an investigative journey to uncover the true stories of crime victims and their loved ones. Unlike most crime shows which focus on the motives or backstory of the killers, this show exposes the real, deadly impact on those who suffer at the hands of the perpetrator. The stories of everyday people who get caught up in these heinous crimes often go unheard and it is equally important that these individuals get to tell their stories as it is for us to hear them. Sunny also interviews the detectives, prosecutors, coroners, and others involved to piece together the truth of each case. With an intention to be socially inclusive, the show highlights stories concerning people of color, women and the LGBTQ community.

programme.title: The Interrogator
programme.sub-title: You Know What Time It Is
programme.desc: True-crime documentary series in which retired Houston Detective Fil Waters, known as the legendary Interrogator, as he has throughout his law enforcement career been able to maintain one of the top case closure rates in the county at over 95%, revisits some of his most shocking and famous cases. Using a combination of re-enactments, interviews, and actual interrogation footage, viewers get to go inside the gripping cases Detective Waters solved, as he reveals how he has gotten some unexpected criminals to come clean.

programme.title: The Interrogator
programme.sub-title: The Murders At Immaculate Auto Sales
programme.desc: True-crime documentary series in which retired Houston Detective Fil Waters, known as the legendary Interrogator, as he has throughout his law enforcement career been able to maintain one of the top case closure rates in the county at over 95%, revisits some of his most shocking and famous cases. Using a combination of re-enactments, interviews, and actual interrogation footage, viewers get to go inside the gripping cases Detective Waters solved, as he reveals how he has gotten some unexpected criminals to come clean.

programme.title: People Magazine uurib
programme.desc: Crime documentary series. Since first hitting the newsstands in 1974, People Magazine has been intriguing millions of readers with their gripping human-interest stories. This series digs deeper into some of the publications most gripping true-life tales. We hear from people directly involved in these dramatic, shocking and sorrowful stories that gained widespread notoriety. People Magazine Investigates shares the twists and turns as the story unfolded to reach its ultimate conclusion.
